faq.subtitle: We answer the main questions other mums have had

faqs.question: What age is the method suitable for?
faqs.answer: The Calm Mum Method is effective for babies from 0 to 24 months. We have specific techniques for each age group: newborns (0-3 months), babies (4-12 months) and toddlers (13-24 months). Each stage has its own particularities and the guide covers them all in detail.

faqs.question: Does it work for very restless babies?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We work especially with babies considered 'difficult' or high demand. The guide includes specific techniques for hyperactive babies, those with colic or who struggle to relax. Many mums have reported extraordinary success even with babies who seemed impossible to settle.

faqs.question: How will I receive the material?
faqs.answer: Immediately after payment confirmation, you'll receive by email the link to download the complete guide in PDF. The material is available for unlimited access, and you can download it as many times as you want. We also send it via WhatsApp to ensure you receive it.

faqs.question: Can I access it on my phone?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The guide is optimised for reading on your phone, tablet, computer or can be printed. We know mums need practicality, so you can consult the techniques anytime, anywhere, even in the middle of the night.

faqs.question: What if I want my money back?
faqs.answer: You have 7 calendar days from purchase to request a full refund, no questions asked. Just send an email to our support and we'll process the refund within 48 hours. It's that simple ‚Äì your satisfaction is our priority.

faqs.question: Does the method work for twins?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have a special section dedicated to twins and multiples. We know it's an even bigger challenge, so we've adapted the techniques for this specific reality. Many mums of twins have already succeeded with our method.
